data.title: 2024/25 Pre-Season Summary of All 20 Premier League Teams
data.meta_description: In this 24/25 PL pre-season summary blog, we summarize all the pre-season games of the 20 teams with all the goals & assists from every game.
data.meta_site_name: ALLABOUTFPL: Your one stop place for all FPL tips, FPL captain picks, FPL news, FPL players, previews, reviews,differential picks, analysis and weekly updates.
data.text:
In this 24/25 PL pre-season summary blog, we summarize all the pre-season games of the 20 teams with all the goals & assists from every game.

Link to all our 2024/25 Pre-Season articles including all team pre-season friendly updates, team previews, fixture analysis, position-wise analysis, differentials, players to target, budget enablers and more. Completely free to access as well!

Pre-Season Summary of All 20 Premier League Teams

Arsenal Pre-Season Summary

Results: Played: 5 Won:4 Draw:1 Lost: 1

20 July Arsenal XI 2-0 Leyton Orient (Goals: Gabriel Jesus, Smith Rowe. Assists: Gabriel Jesus, Nketiah)

25 July Arsenal 1-1 AFC Bournemouth (Arsenal win 5-4 on pens) (Goal: Fabio Viera. Assist: Reiss Nelson)

28 July Arsenal 2-1 Man Utd (Goal: Fabio Viera, Martinelli Assist: Ethan Nwaneri, Myles Lewis-Skelly)

There was a pre-planned penalty shootout after the game which Man United won 4-3. Ethan Wheatley missed for Man United whereas Kai Havertz & Kiwor missed it for Arsenal)

1 Aug Liverpool 2-1 Arsenal (Goal: Kai Havertz. Assist: Martin Odegaard)

7 Aug Arsenal 4-1 Bayer Leverkusen(Goals : Zinchenko, Trossard, Jesus, Havertz, (Assists: Havertz(2))

11 Aug Arsenal 2 â€“ 0 Lyon (Goals: Saliba, Gabriel) (Assists: Declan Rice)

For more detailed updates on the lineups, goals + assists and minutes check out @FPL_Romfroskâ€™s detailed Arsenal pre-season guide

Arsenal Friendlies Summary:

Key Notes from Arsenal Pre-Season:

Kai Havertz played a deeper role in Arsenalâ€™s friendly vs Liverpool but still managed to score

â€œHe looks really good. He looks really sharp. He has changed a lot of things over the summer. He has come in top condition againâ€. â€œHe needs to be in that condition to get the best out of himself. He has realised that. And Iâ€™m really happy with what heâ€™s shown today again.â€ â€“ Arteta on Gabriel Jesus

In the game vs Bayer Leverkusen, Havertz played the 1st half in midfield & picked up 2 assists. He played up top in the 2nd half & scored!

Brentford also played a Wolfsburg 11 on the 10th of August, completely different teams from the 4-4 draw. Ben Mee, and Lewis Potter both featured along with Toney. Lewis Potter & Onyeka were the goal scorers in a 2-1 win (2nd 11 game so not added to the summary below)

For more detailed updates on the lineups, goals + assists and minutes check out @FPL_Romfroskâ€™s Brentford Pre-season guide

Brentford Pre-Season Notes:

Thiago suffered a meniscus injury during the Beesâ€™ 5-2 victory over AFC Wimbledon on 20 July, which has been repaired. The striker will now begin a period of recovery and rehabilitation and is expected to return towards the end of the year.

Newcastle United Pre-Season Key Notes:

Newcastle played their last two friendlies in back-to-back days. Most of the main team played vs Girona on Friday Night & did not feature in the game vs Stade Brestois.
